title: Halloween Basket
desc:
Post 2416
- __Seasonal__: This card has double the effect during the month it is based off of. (October)

- Trick or treat! Knock on everyone else's doorstep and get 1 Candy (2389) with a random color that they have in their hand. Players may give you an additional Candy (2389) with an additional color of their choosing if they would like to.
